H0.text: What Detroit-area stadium was sold in 2009 for just $583,000. Tiger Stadium

H1.text: What Detroit-area stadium was sold in 2009 for just $583,000. Ford Field

H2.text: What Detroit-area stadium was sold in 2009 for just $583,000. Comerica Park

H3.text: What Detroit-area stadium was sold in 2009 for just $583,000. Silverdome

A4.text: The sale of the Silverdome, completed in 1975 at a cost of $55.7 million and sold in 2009 for $583,000.
